author: Kamran Rahman
title: Fauci: Social distancing guidelines likely to remain
description: The Trump administration had originally issued federal guidance that urged Americans to avoid gathering in large groups and stay at home for 15 days.
content:
It's going to be a matter of weeks. It's not going to be tomorrow, and it's certainly not going to be next week," he said. "It's going to be a little bit more than that.
Faucis assessment Sunday echoes Surgeon General Jerome Adams, who acknowledged
